H0.text: who proposed the virginia plan at the constitutional convention. Alexander Hamilton

H1.text: who proposed the virginia plan at the constitutional convention. George Mason

H2.text: who proposed the virginia plan at the constitutional convention. James Wilson

H3.text: who proposed the virginia plan at the constitutional convention. Madison

A4.text: Madison worked with other members of the Virginia delegation to create and present the Virginia Plan.

A5.text: Hamilton's plan favored Northern speculators and was disadvantageous to states such as Virginia.
